Together In Lebanon

Gathering Rotarians from around the world in Lebanon

Beirut, Oct 5 - Oct 11, 2015

View Schedule

  • Discover Lebanon

    Experience Lebanon by immersing yourself in its rich cultural and religious heritage, mingling with the Lebanese and exploring various regions.

  • Network

    Benefit from professional networking sessions with fellow Rotarians, visit projects completed in Lebanon and meet locally twinned clubs.

  • Foster Friendships

    The goal of Together in Lebanon is to strengthen the bond between local Rotarians, their friends and the larger Rotarian community!

Why Together in Lebanon?

The purpose of the meeting is to enable Rotarians worldwide to discover (or rediscover) Lebanon today, and to create new friendship ties with their Lebanese peer. The agenda for this meeting includes Rotarian and touristic activities. United by the love of Lebanon, what better time and setting for Rotarians and friends to meet and share old experiences while creating new ones! We expect to welcome:

  • Rotarian friends of Lebanon
  • Rotarians of clubs twinned with Lebanese clubs
  • Rotarians of Lebanese origin, along with their families and friends.
  • Rotarians from Districts and Countries members of an ICC with Lebanon
  • Rotarian members of Fellowship and Action Groups that have members in the Lebanese Rotary Community.

Transportation & Lodging

Dear Rotarian friends,

Pursuant to their mission of building better friendship for a more peaceful world, and after the successful “Together in Lebanon 2010”, the Rotary clubs of Lebanon invite Rotarians of Lebanese origin as well as Rotarians friends of Lebanon, their friends and families, to the 2nd international gathering in Lebanon: Together in Lebanon 2015. A week long program of tours and festivities is scheduled from Monday October 5, till Sunday October 11, 2015.

Visiting Rotarians will have the opportunity to:
  
  - Discover and Experience Lebanon by immersing themselves in its rich cultural and religious heritage, mingling with the Lebanese and exploring various regions.

  - Benefit from professional networking sessions with fellow Rotarians, visit projects completed in Lebanon and meet locally twinned clubs and other clubs.

  - Foster Friendships by strengthening the bond between local Rotarians and the larger Rotarian community.

United by the love of Lebanon, what better time and setting for Rotarians and friends to meet and share old experiences while creating new ones!

Yours in Rotary, 
Ronald Farra
“Together in Lebanon 2015” Committee Chair

Program and Schedule

Get ready for a fabulous week in Lebanon. This is what we offer you: From Monday October 5, 2015 till Sunday October 11, 2015
  • 6 Different tours (2 alternative tours each day) with professional guides
  • Visit includes UNESCO World Heritage Sites
  • Lunches & dinners in various areas of Lebanon with local Rotarians
  • Opening Ceremony and Gala Dinner in the company of local Rotarians
  • All transportation covered (except airport pickup and return to be booked with your hotel)
  • Banner Exchange Ceremony, Peer-to-peer professional meetings and much more!

All of the above for USD 1,000 per person, all taxes included. Special prices in 4 star Beirut hotels starting USD 60 per night per person (in a double occupancy room).

Payment is fully refundable in case of force majeure, see conditions at the registration website.

Details

Tours

  • Sidon, Tyre*
  • Beiteddine, Deir El Kamar
  • Beirut National Museum, MIM Museum, Downtown with archeological excavations
  • Jeita, Byblos*, and Harissa
  • Tripoli and Batroun
  • Cedars*, Becharreh, Gebran Museum, Qadisha Holy Valley*
  • Baalbeck*, Anjar*, Ksara
  • Wineries Tour (Ksara, Kefraya, Massaya)
(*) UNESCO World Heritage Site

Events

  • Opening ceremony followed by cocktail dinner
  • Vinifest (Lebanon Wine Fair) Visit & Dinner
  • Closing Ceremony and Gala Dinner

All lunches at 1:00-1:30pm, dinners at 8:00-8:30pm.

Contact

For any questions or comments, please contact us at info@togetherinlebanon.org
